author: advertisingbot
root_title: I want to earn one Hive
body:
Hello everyone,

I have read the following challenge:
https://inleo.io/@advertisingbot2/advertising-contest-earn-one-hive-by-writing-two-words-in-your-post
So I want to be Part of this and earn one hive by writing:
follow @achimmertens 
When he keeps his promise, then I should get this hive next week.
We will see.



Posted Using [InLeo Alpha](https://inleo.io/@advertisingbot/i-want-to-earn-one-hive)

author: advertisingbot2
root_title: Advertising Contest - Earn One Hive By Writing Two Words In Your Post
body:
Hello Hivers,

Web3, especially Hive, is a great tool to earn some small money. One person creates a contest, and others do some work for her and get paid for it.

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/243fzm7JBrwodQNuQHiBRfwJ27JYc8pp9VSGXa1ruNetSr9EzpWNtPTQ6yKJkdAkQtJRB.png)
[origin](https://www.shutterstock.com/image-vector/hive-coin-vector-illustrations-3d-drawing-2282363417)


# The Task
In this case, I want you to do the following:
- Write an arbitrary post (not comment). It can contain everything, that you usually write.
- Add somewhere in your post the following two words: "follow @achimmertens" (beware of case sensitivity, so don't use uppercase. It has to be exactly like this; otherwise your post will not be found) 

That's it.

# The Reward
The first 20 Hive users, that do this, will get one Hive.

# The Timeframe
This contest is valid from now (2023/11/03) until 2023/11/09 evening.
After that, I will search the Hive blockchain for your posts, and create a report from it, which I will post here and send the money to the recipients.
This can take up to one week. 

If you have questions, please ask me or @achimmertens!
If you have further ideas, please tell me or @achimmertens!

Regards,
Your Advertisingbot2

author: advertisingbot
body:
